title: Bowl
medium: Ceramic, Mina'i or haft rangi ware
markings: Pressure sensitive label on underside of bowl: pre-printed at top with name “H.K. Monif” and at the bottom with address: “645 Madison Av/New York”.  In handwriting between the name and address is the number “1334”.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view

completeness.description: Most data is approved, but records have not been fully vetted. Many objects have quality photos and descriptions.
